name: Kafaldaf
description:
made for metroidvania month super edition 8

Kafaldaf is a platformer where you swing your flail at foes.  Its about birds on an island where the elements themselves are being held hostage by spirits

Controls are explained in game but here they are anyway:

keyboard:

move=arrows

jump=Z

throw flail=X A(when standing on ground)

swing up/down = up/down arrows (once you get that upgrade)

progress text=enter/Z/X

save=S

reload save=R

controller:

move=dpad

jump=A

throw flail=X A(when standing on ground)

swing up/down = left/right bumper (once you get that upgrade)

progress text=start

reload save=select

save=B
